com.ingenico.pclservice

Class PCLFileSharing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ingenico.pclservice.PCLFileSharing

  • public class PCLFileSharing
extends java.lang.Object
    The PCLFileSharing class implement a file sharing system between Android and a Telium device. With this class, you can create an app which can get, send and delete file on a Telium device. This class is built around a main instance that can be retrieve by calling the getSharedInstance() method. You will need to call the init() method at first in ordre to provide the Context which call the PCLFileSharing system.

      • init

public void init(Context context)

      • start

        public void start(java.lang.Integer port,
                  java.lang.Boolean isNotNetwork,
                  PCLFileSharing.PCLFileSharingOnStart callback)
        Start the PCLFileSharing server. It will be executed on an AsyncTask and call the callback with a PCLFileSharingResult param.
        Parameters:
        port - The port where open the server.
        isNotNetwork - Specify is the terminal which you want connect is connected on a local network. If true, it means that the terminal is in Bluetooth or USB. If false, it means that the terminal is on a local network.
        callback - The PCLFileSharingOnStart callback to be notify when the task is done and get the result.

      • startAsLLTMode

        public void startAsLLTMode(Context context,
                           java.lang.String pairingFileName,
                           PCLFileSharing.PCLFileSharingOnStart callback)
        Start the PCLFileSharing server with a Telium device in LLT mode. This method will only works on a USB communication and on the LLT mode of the connected Telium device.
        Parameters:
        context - Specify the current context which use the method. It will be use to ask for USB permissions.
        pairingFileName - The name of the file that you are using to save the selected Telium device.
        callback - The PCLFileSharingOnStart callback to be notify when the task is done and get the result.

      • startAndLaunchDoUpdate

        public void startAndLaunchDoUpdate(Context context,
                                   java.lang.String pairingFileName,
                                   int port,
                                   PCLFileSharing.PCLFileSharingOnStart callback)
        Start the PCLFileSharing server and launch the remote upgrade of the connected terminal. It will be executed on an AsyncTask and call the callback with a PCLFileSharingResult param. The method will take care of saving the TMS settings and start the remove upgrade of the connected terminal.
        Parameters:
        context - Specify the current context which use the method.
        pairingFileName - The name of the file that you are using to save the selected Telium device.
        port - The port where open the server.
        callback - The PCLFileSharingOnStart callback to be notify when the task is done and get the result.

      • stop

        public void stop(PCLFileSharing.PCLFileSharingOnStop callback)
        Stop the PCLFileSharing server.
        Parameters:
        callback - The PCLFileSharingOnStop callback to be notify when the task is done and get the result.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Close socket and release register and service connection Does not restore previous TMS params on Terminal

      • upload

        public void upload(java.io.File file,
                   java.lang.String toDirectory,
                   PCLFileSharing.PCLFileSharingOnUpload callback)
        Upload a file from Android to Telium.
        Parameters:
        file - A File object that you want to send.
        toDirectory - The directory path where send the file.
        callback - The PCLFileSharingOnUpload callback to be notify when the task is done and get the result.

      • upload

        public void upload(java.util.List<java.io.File> files,
                   java.lang.String toDirectory,
                   PCLFileSharing.PCLFileSharingOnUploads callback)
        Upload a list of files from Android to Telium.
        Parameters:
        files - A List of File object that you want to send.
        toDirectory - The directory path where send the file.
        callback - The PCLFileSharingOnUploads callback to be notify when a file has been send and get the result for this file.

      • list

        public void list(java.lang.String path,
                 PCLFileSharing.PCLFileSharingOnList callback)
        List the files from Telium.
        Parameters:
        path - The directory path that you want to list.
        callback - The PCLFileSharingOnList callback to be notify when the task is done and get an array of TeliumFile object that describe the files in the requested directory.

      • download

        public void download(java.lang.String filepath,
                     java.lang.String toDirectory,
                     PCLFileSharing.PCLFileSharingOnDownload callback)
        Download a file from Telium to Android.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The path of the file that you want download.
        toDirectory - The path of the directory where save the file.
        callback - The PCLFileSharingOnDownload callback to be notify when the task is done and get the result.

        public boolean isStarted()

        Returns:
